cast.name: 布莱恩·莫尔克 Brian Molko
史蒂芬·欧斯戴 Stefan Olsdal

introduction: We Come In Pieces is the second live DVD by the alternative rock band Placebo. It was announced on August 24, 2011 and released on October 31, 2011. It was recorded during a Placebo concert in Brixton Academy, London, on September 28, 2010, the final show of the Battle For The Sun tour. The title of the DVD is a nod to an Irish Math-Punk band of the same name.The live performance includes 20 songs, of which 15 were never before seen on DVD.The release has DVD, 2 Disc Deluxe and Blu-ray editions. The Deluxe and Blu-ray editions include a documentary film on the band's 2009–2010 tour.
